title: HOW TO FIX FLAT TIRES FOR 10 YEARS

tasks.task: Applying flat tire repair using sealant.
subtasks: Rotating tire to position valve stem upward.
Removing valve core using provided tool.
Allowing tire to deflate completely.
Attaching pump to inject sealant.
Injecting specified amount of sealant (32 ounces in this case).
Retrieving and reinstalling valve core.
Checking and adjusting tire balance if necessary.
Driving test to verify repair effectiveness.
Applying preventive measure to other tires (if applicable).
Ordering additional sealant to apply to other affected machinery.
Recommending tractor attachments and services for potential customers.
Ensuring proper tire inflation and maintenance.
Monitoring equipment for signs of wear or damage.
Responding to equipment malfunctions promptly.

tasks.task: 1) Repairing flat tires using sealant (with subtasks as mentioned), 2) Managing preventive maintenance on agricultural equipment (ordering supplies, checking balance), 3) Operating equipment safely (keeping tires properly maintained).

So summarizing, I think there are three main MAINTASKs with their respective subtasks. The tasks cover applying the sealant, managing recurring issues by ordering more product, and maintaining agricultural equipment safely. These should all be acceptable.
